title: Vel'koz champion shard not redeeming
body: Restarted client a couple times now.

replies.body:
just got home and tried it again and it still doesn't seem to be working.
If it helps it's a champion shard from the re-roll permanent option.

It looks like most players have been able to get their shards to redeem now, so go ahead and try restarting one more time for me since this post was made at about the same time the fix went out. 

Feel free to hit me back up if it still isn't working though!!
